channel.title: CVE Feed for Citrix -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Citrix -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-27511|2024-09-17T01:10:57.643Z -- citrix -- citrix%20application%20delivery%20management%20%28citrix%20adm%29
item.description: Corruption of the system by a remote, unauthenticated user. The impact of this can include the reset of the administrator password at the next device reboot, allowing an attacker with ssh access to connect with the default administrator credentials after the device has rebooted.

item.title: CVE-2024-7890|2024-09-12T03:55:27.629Z -- citrix -- citrix%20workspace%20app%20for%20windows
item.description: Local privilege escalation allows a low-privileged user to gain SYSTEM privileges in Citrix Workspace app for Windows

item.title: CVE-2024-7889|2024-09-12T03:55:26.283Z -- citrix -- citrix%20workspace%20app%20for%20windows
item.description: Local privilege escalation allows a low-privileged user to gain SYSTEM privileges in Citrix Workspace app for Windows

item.title: CVE-2024-6151|2024-07-18T03:55:19.557Z -- citrix -- windows%20virtual%20delivery%20agent
item.description: Local Privilege escalation allows a low-privileged user to gain SYSTEM privileges in Virtual Delivery Agent for Windows used by Citrix Virtual Apps and Desktops and Citrix DaaS

item.title: CVE-2024-6151|2024-07-12T20:06:00.319Z -- citrix -- windows%20virtual%20delivery%20agent
item.description: Local Privilege escalation allows a low-privileged user to gain SYSTEM privileges in Virtual Delivery Agent for Windows used by Citrix Virtual Apps and Desktops and Citrix DaaS

item.description: Redirection of users to a vulnerable URL in Citrix Workspace app for HTML5

item.description: Bypass of GACS Policy Configuration settings in Citrix Workspace app for HTML5

item.title: CVE-2024-6150|2024-07-10T20:31:26.370Z -- citrix -- citrix%20provisioning
item.description: A non-admin user can cause short-term disruption in Target VM availability in Citrix Provisioning

item.title: CVE-2024-5661|2024-06-13T05:58:45.694Z -- citrix -- citrix%20hypervisor
item.description: An issue has been identified in both XenServer 8 and Citrix Hypervisor 8.2 CU1 LTSR which may allow a malicious administrator of a guest VM to cause the host to become slow and/or unresponsive.

item.description: An issue has been identified in both XenServer 8 and Citrix Hypervisor 8.2 CU1 LTSR which may allow a malicious administrator of a guest VM to cause the host to become slow and/or unresponsive.
